Place Items

# Place Items

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                        | Support     |
| ---------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
place-items-start
```    | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-items-end
```      | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-items-center
```   | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-items-baseline
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-items-stretch
```  | 🌐 Web only |
